## About This Repository

This repository, **TubeDigest-AI-Powered-YouTube-Summarizer-API-Service**, provides a high-performance Flask API service that leverages NLP to generate concise summaries from YouTube video transcripts. It features a clean web interface for seamless interaction and rapid content digestion, ideal for researchers, students, and content creators.

**GitHub:** [TubeDigest-AI-Powered-YouTube-Summarizer-API-Service](https://github.com/chirag127/TubeDigest-AI-Powered-YouTube-Summarizer-API-Service)

### AI Agent Directives

*   **Prime Directive:** Uphold Zero-Defect, High-Velocity, Future-Proof standards.
*   **Technology Stack:** Python 3.10+, Flask, `uv`, Ruff, Pytest.
*   **Architecture:** Modular Monolith.
*   **AI Integration:** Leverages NLP for text summarization; specific models can be configured. Prioritize robust error handling and clear API contracts.
*   **Verification:** All contributions must pass Linting (`ruff check .`), Formatting (`ruff format .`), and Testing (`pytest`).
*   **Contribution:** Adhere to Semantic Versioning and the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/chirag127/TubeDigest-AI-Powered-YouTube-Summarizer-API-Service/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
